entity.name: Doctor Who
entity.description: Extraterrestre de 900 ans, le Docteur est un aventurier qui voyage à travers le temps et l'espace à l'aide de son vaisseau, le TARDIS. Ils fait de nombreuses rencontres sur les diverses planètes qu'il explore...

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
After working 156 days straight, Dr. Bonnie Henry is preparing to take a day off...tomorrow. 

Oh and she's being held up as an example in front of the world for BC's response to the pandemic.

The Top Doctor Who Aced the Coronavirus Test https://t.co/TdoIxGzr43
